00033 #include "kvi_kvs_script.h"

00035 class KVIRC_API KviKvsAliasManager : public QObject
00036 {
00037         Q_OBJECT
00038 protected: // it only can be created and destroyed by KviKvsAliasManager::init()/done()
00039         KviKvsAliasManager();
00040         ~KviKvsAliasManager();
00041 protected:
00042         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsScript>        * m_pAliasDict;
00043         static KviKvsAliasManager  * m_pAliasManager;
00044 public:
00045         static KviKvsAliasManager * instance()
00046                 { return m_pAliasManager; };
00047         static void init(); // called by KviKvs::init()
00048         static void done(); // called by KviKvs::done()
00049 
00050         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsScript> * aliasDict(){ return m_pAliasDict; };
00051         const KviKvsScript * lookup(const QString & szName)
00052                 { return m_pAliasDict->find(szName); };
00053         void add(const QString &szName,KviKvsScript * pAlias);
00054         bool remove(const QString & szName)
00055                 { return m_pAliasDict->remove(szName); };
00056         void clear()
00057                 { m_pAliasDict->clear(); };
00058 
00059         void save(const QString & filename);
00060         void load(const QString & filename);
00061 
00062         void completeCommand(const QString &word,KviPointerList<QString> * matches);
00063 signals:
00064         void aliasRefresh(const QString &);
00065 };
